## fpRejectNull() function

Returns a Promise of rejection with the supplied error if the value is `null` or `undefined`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function fpRejectNull<T>(value: Promise<T> | T, error: unknown): Promise<Exclude<T, null | undefined>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | Promise&lt;T&gt; \| T |  |
|  error | unknown |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Exclude&lt;T, null \| undefined&gt;&gt;
